title: 你们都喜欢吃什么食物
txt_content: 个人是比较喜欢吃猪肉的

replies.author: 陳焌傑
replies.txt_content:
um，還水？！
um，so H2O！
我愛吃雞蛋，巧克力！
I love eating eggs and chocolate！
感觉猪排性价比比较高把，能喂狼，某些插件MOD还有其他用途

replies.author: 陳焌傑
replies.txt_content:
hey，誰說一定要minecraft 裡的？lz說“豬肉”，沒有“豬扒”
hey，nobody tell you guys the food should be in minecraft！LZ said meat，not pork

replies.author: Creeper娘控
replies.txt_content: 牛肉~得皮革时顺便刷到好多
